items.name: Tomato Soup
items.description: A comforting bowl of rich, velvety tomato soup, made from sun-ripened tomatoes, slow-cooked with aromatic herbs and a touch of cream.

items.name: Lentil Soup
items.description: A smooth, savoury blend of lentils and delicate spices, finished with herbs for a comforting start.

items.name: Veg Soup
items.description: A delicate blend of garden-fresh vegetables in a light, aromatic subtly seasoned broth.

items.name: Sweet Corn Soup
items.description: A delightful blend of tender sweet corn kernels in a silky, savory broth, gently seasoned with aromatic spices.

items.name: Chicken Soup
items.description: A heartwarming bowl of tender chicken, slow-simmered with fresh vegetables, fragrant herbs, and a flavorful broth.

items.name: Mutton Soup
items.description: A robust and flavorful soup made with tender, slow-cooked mutton, infused with aromatic spices and herbs.

items.name: Veg Pakkora
items.description: Crisp, golden-fried vegetables, delicately spiced and served with a zesty chutney.

items.name: Paneer Pakkora
items.description: Golden-brown fritters feature cubes of fresh paneer, coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to perfection.

items.name: Gobi 65

items.name: Chicken Pakkora
items.description: Tender chicken pieces coated in a spiced, crispy batter, served with a tangy sauce.
